mapper.update: UPDATE inspct SET type_id = #{checkTypeClass.id}, check_dept = #{checkOffice.id}, check_person = #{checkPerson}, inspection_dept_id = #{inspectionOffice.id}, template_id = #{templateId}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
